title: Retirement: Azure Disk Encryption
description:
Azure
Disk Encryption will be retired on September 15, 2028 and we recommend you transition to Encryption
at Host by that date.   Alternate disk encryption solutions such as
Encryption At Host and CVM OS disk encryption offer broader operating system
supp

title: [Launched] Generally Available: GitHub Copilot app modernization capabilities for Java and .NET are now available
description:

title: Understand Data Models
description: Learn how to evaluate Azure data store models based on workload patterns, scale, consistency, and governance to guide service selection.

title: Prepare to Choose a Data Store in Azure
description: Learn how to choose the right Azure data store for your workloads by evaluating functional, performance, cost, and security requirements.

title: Application design considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
description: Learn how to implement a mission-critical workload that users access over a public endpoint without extra dependencies to other company resources.

title: Application platform considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
description: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without additional dependencies to other company resources - App Platform.

title: Data platform for mission-critical workloads on Azure
description: Data decisions for the architecture of a mission-critical workload on Azure.

title: Deployment and testing for mission-critical workloads on Azure
description: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without extra dependencies to other company resources - Deployment and Testing.

title: Health modeling for mission-critical workloads on Azure
description: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without extra dependencies to other company resources - Health modeling.

title: Mission-critical architecture on Azure
description: Architecture design for a highly reliable workload.

title: Networking and connectivity for mission-critical workloads on Azure
description: Networking decisions for the architecture of a mission-critical workload on Azure.

title: Operations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
description: Guidance for operations for the architecture of a mission-critical workload on Azure.

title: Security Considerations for Mission-Critical Workloads on Azure
description: Learn about the security considerations for a workload that's accessed over a public endpoint without dependencies on other company resources.

title: [Launched] Generally Available: Using Server-sent events with Application Gateway
description:

availability, enabling real-time data streaming from server to client.
Server-sent events utilize server push technology on a persistent HTTP
connection for seamless updates to the cl

title: Use Azure Synapse Analytics for Near Real-Time Lakehouse Data Processing
description: Use Azure Event Hubs, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure Data Lake Storage to create an end-to-end, near real-time data lakehouse data processing solution.

title: [Launched] Generally Available: Vaulted backup for Azure Files (Premium)
description:
Announcing the General availability of vaulted backup for Azure Files shares premium!  Azure Backup brings vaulted protection to Azure Files shares premium, to ensure business
continuity and compliance, even in the face of accidental deletion, malicious
a

title: Extract text from objects using Power Automate and AI Builder
description: Use AI Builder and Azure AI Document Intelligence in a Power Automate workflow to extract text from images, for indexing and retrieval.

title: IBM z/OS mainframe migration with Avanade AMT
description: See how to use the Avanade Automated Migration Technology (AMT) framework to migrate IBM z/OS mainframe workloads to Azure.

title: Refactor mainframe architecture by using CloudFrame Renovate
description: Refactor your mainframe architecture to Azure by using the CloudFrame Renovate code migration tool. Renovate migrates COBOL to Java.

title: Extend mainframe applications to Azure by using Verastream Host Integrator
description: Extend your mainframe applications to Azure by using the Verastream Host Integrator (VHI). VHI simplifies mainframe and host-based application functionality into a web service.

title: Mainframe file and tape backup to Azure using Luminex
description: Use Luminex products to transfer mainframe file and tape data to and from Azure to meet backup, archival, and other business needs.

title: Migrate mainframe data tier to Azure with mLogica LIBER*IRIS
description: Find out how mLogica LIBER*IRIS provides a proven solution for bulk data migration from a mainframe to Azure for enterprise workloads.

title: Migrate Mainframe Data to Azure
description: Learn how to use RDRS, a mainframe data replication solution, to migrate data to and from multiple Azure data platform services.

title: Modernize Mainframe Workloads by using BMC AMI Cloud
description: Learn how to use BMC AMI Cloud to send mainframe data directly to Azure Blob Storage as part of a mainframe modernization migration.

title: Replicate Mainframe Data by using Precisely Connect
description: Learn how to use Precisely Connect to migrate legacy mainframe and midrange systems to the Azure platform.

title: Micro Focus Enterprise Server on Azure VMs
description: Optimize, modernize, and streamline IBM z/OS mainframe applications by using Micro Focus Enterprise Server 6.0 on Azure VMs.

title: Migrate AIX workloads to Azure with Skytap
description: This example illustrates a migration of AIX logical partitions (LPARs) to Skytap on Azure.

title: Migrate IBM i series to Azure with Skytap
description: This example architecture shows how to use the native IBM i backup and recovery services with Microsoft Azure components.

title: Modernize Mainframe and Midrange Data
description: Learn how to modernize IBM mainframe and midrange data. Use a data-first approach to migrate the data to scalable and more secure cloud storage on Azure.

title: Move archive data from mainframe systems to Azure
description: Learn about a reference architecture that shows how to move data from mainframe and midrange systems to Azure.

title: High-volume batch transaction processing
description: Use Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and Azure Service Bus to implement high-volume batch transaction processing.

title: Re-engineer IBM z/OS batch applications on Azure
description: Use Azure services to re-engineer mainframe batch applications. This architecture change can reduce costs and improve scalability.

title: Refactor IBM z/TPF mainframe systems to Azure
description: Learn how to refactor IBM z/TPF mainframe systems to functionally equivalent systems on Microsoft Azure.

title: Refactor mainframe applications with Advanced
description: Learn how to use the Automated COBOL Refactoring solution from Advanced to modernize your mainframe COBOL applications, run them on Azure, and reduce costs.

title: Refactor mainframe applications with Astadia
description: See an architecture that uses Astadia to migrate COBOL applications from an on-premises environment to the cloud.

title: Rehost IMS DC and IMS DB on Azure by Using Raincode IMSql
description: Learn how to rehost IBM IMS DC and IMS DB on Azure by using Raincode IMSql. Rehost seamlessly without translating or changing your application.

title: Rehost mainframe applications by using NTT DATA UniKix
description: Improve efficiency and cut costs by running mainframe applications and workloads on Azure. Use UniKix software from NTT DATA to rehost legacy assets.

title: Replatform AIX workloads on Azure
description: Learn how to replatform AIX workloads on Azure to reduce your TCO, improve business agility, and improve operational resiliency.

title: Build and Deploy Custom Document Processing Models on Azure
description: Learn more about Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

title: N-tier Architecture Style
description: Learn about the benefits, challenges, and best practices for N-tier architectures on Azure, which separates an app into logical layers and physical tiers.

title: Use AI to Forecast Customer Orders
description: Learn how to use AI and machine learning to forecast a customer's future order quantity for a specific SKU. See the Azure services that you can use in this solution.

description:

title: Guidance for using Azure Key Vault in a multitenant solution
description: This article describes the features of Azure Key Vault that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance for how to use Azure Key Vault in a multitenant solution.

title: Agent Factory: Creating a blueprint for safe and secure AI agents
description:
Azure AI Foundry brings together security, safety, and governance in a layered process enterprises can follow to build trust in their agents.

title: Build real-time monitoring and observable systems for media
description: Learn how to implement real-time monitoring and observability of systems and end-user device telemetry data.

title: Deploy microservices with Azure Container Apps
description: Deploy existing microservice applications with Azure Container Apps.

description: Migrate an on-premises IBM AIX system and web application to a highly available, secure RedHat Enterprise Linux solution in Azure.

description: Create great experiences for developers, support community engagement & contribution, and monetize your API offerings.

title: Use Azure Firewall to help protect an AKS cluster
description: Deploy an AKS cluster in a hub-and-spoke network topology by using Terraform and Azure DevOps. Help protect inbound and outbound traffic by using Azure Firewall.

description: Learn how to deploy AKS clusters using a blue-green strategy.

title: Mission-Critical Baseline with App Service
description: Learn how to deploy mission-critical web applications by using the Web Apps feature of Azure App Service and the reliable web app pattern.

title: Multi-region load balancing
description: Learn how to build an Azure system that serves web and non-web workloads with resilient multi-tier applications in multiple Azure regions.

title: Virtual network peering and VPN gateways
description: Review the differences between virtual network peering and VPN gateways, which are two ways to connect virtual networks in Azure.

title: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure File Sync in Poland Central and Spain Central
description: Azure File Sync enables seamless tiering of data from on-premises Windows Servers to Azure Files for hybrid use cases and simplified migration. It also enables you to leverage the performance, flexibility and compatibility of your on-premises File Server

description:
Azure Kubernetes Service Automatic helps teams go from commit to cloud without friction, accelerating delivery and unleashing innovation.

title: What is a data lake?
description: Learn about the advantages of using data lake storage repositories, which can hold terabytes and petabytes of data in its native, raw format.

title: Azure Virtual Machines baseline architecture
description: Learn how to set up an environment that's configured to run a workload on Azure Virtual Machines.

title: Azure Virtual Machines baseline architecture in an Azure landing zone
description: Learn how to build on the baseline architecture to address changes and expectations when you deploy it in an Azure landing zone.

title: Baseline highly available zone-redundant app services web application
description: A baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant App Service web application.

description: Set up improved-security private connectivity to an App Service web app or function app from an on-premises network or from within an Azure virtual network.

title: Busy Front End antipattern
description: Asynchronous work on a large number of background threads can starve other foreground tasks of resources.

description: Get information about doing a failure mode analysis (FMA) for cloud solutions that are based on Azure.

description: Learn about extract, transform, load (ETL) and extract, load, transform (ELT) data transformation pipelines, and how to use control flows and data flows.

Settings of Azure Application Gateway, by default, it performs all validations
in the TLS handsh

title: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure SQL hub experience in Azure portal
description: Choosing the right Azure SQL service can be challenging. To make this easier, you can now visit the Azure SQL hub, a new home for everything related to Azure SQL in the Azure portal. Whether youâ€™re new to Azure SQL or an experienced user, the hub helps yo

title: Use AI enrichment with image and text processing
description: Learn how to transform unstructured image and text data into full-text searchable content with Azure AI Search prebuilt skills and custom skills.

title: Building the First Layer of Defense with Azure Security Services
description: Secure your IT environment by using Azure security services and Azure Security Benchmark. This article is part of a series.

title: DevSecOps for Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
description: Learn how to use DevSecOps for IaC to more securely and efficiently deploy cloud infrastructure into a new Azure landing zone.

title: Highly available SharePoint farm
description: Deploy a highly available SharePoint farm for intranet capabilities that uses Microsoft Entra ID, a SQL always on instance, and SharePoint resources.

title: Build ETL pipelines with Azure Databricks and Delta Lake
description: Create ETL pipelines for batch and streaming data with Azure Databricks to simplify data lake ingestion at any scale.

title: Mainframe File Replication and Sync on Azure
description: Learn about several options for moving, converting, transforming, and storing mainframe and midrange file system data on-premises and in Azure.

title: Map threats to your IT environment
description: Diagram the IT environment of your organization and develop a threat map to plan and build your defensive layer of security. This article is the second in a part of a series.

title: Build the second layer of defense with Microsoft Defender XDR Solutions
description: Add additional security to your IT environment by using Microsoft 365 security service in addition to Azure security. This article is part of a series. Now with the information about Sentinel running in the unified portal.

title: Integrate Azure and Microsoft Defender XDR security services
description: Integrate security solutions from Azure and Microsoft 365 to create robust security for your hybrid and cloud IT environments. This article is part of a series.

title: Migrate Cloud Workloads Across Security Tenants
description: Learn how to define and implement a cross-tenant workload migration strategy to address business transformations like acquisitions or divestitures.
